item.title: AWS Machine Learning Specialty: Know these math formulae before exam!
item.description: Formulae Cheat Sheet to Prepare for Machine Learning Specialty $$ \begin{aligned} Precision = PPV = \frac{TP}{TP+FP} \\\\\\ Recall = Sensitivity = TPR = \frac{TP}{TP+FN} \\\\\\ Specificity = TNR = \frac{TN}{TN+FP} \\\\\\ F1 = \frac{2 * TP}{TP+FP+FN} = \frac{2 * Precision * Recall }{ Precision + Recall} \\\\\\ \end{aligned} $$
